missionDescription: To make everyday tools and equipment accessible and affordable for everyone, empowering smarter living through simple and secure rentals.
visionDescription: To become the leading rental platform in the region, transforming how people access items they need — without the need to own them.
coreValuesDescription: We value trust, simplicity, and affordability — making rentals easy, safe, and sustainable through a connected community.

shareBannerDescription: Got tools, cameras, gear, or equipment you don't use every day? Don't let them sit around collecting dust — turn them into extra income with Rento. Our platform makes it easy for you to share what you own with others who need it, whether it's for a day, a weekend, or longer.
overviewSubtitle: The leading platform for tool and equipment sharing
overviewDescription1: Rento is a revolutionary peer-to-peer rental platform that connects people who have tools and equipment with those who need them. Whether you're a DIY enthusiast, professional contractor, or just someone who needs a specific tool for a project, Rento makes it easy to find and rent what you need.
overviewDescription2: Our platform is built on the principles of community, sustainability, and economic efficiency. By sharing resources, we reduce waste, save money, and build stronger communities. Every rental transaction helps both the owner earn extra income and the renter access tools they might not otherwise afford.
overviewDescription3: With advanced security features, comprehensive insurance options, and a user-friendly interface, Rento ensures that every rental experience is safe, convenient, and rewarding for all parties involved.
feature1: Secure payment processing with escrow protection
feature4: Verified user profiles and review system
step1Description: Browse our extensive catalog of tools and equipment. Use filters to find exactly what you need, when you need it.
step2Description: Select your rental dates, review the terms, and complete your booking with our secure payment system.
step3Description: Meet with the owner, collect your rental, and enjoy using quality tools for your project.
ctaDescription: Join thousands of users who are already saving money and earning extra income through Rento.
pricingSubtitle: No hidden fees. Clear commission structure that works for everyone.
commissionDescription: We take a small 10% commission from each successful rental to cover platform costs, security, and support services.
renterBenefit1: No additional fees beyond the rental price
renterBenefit3: Access to quality tools at affordable rates
ownerBenefit2: No listing fees or monthly subscriptions
cameraDescription: Professional DSLR camera for photography projects
toolDescription: Heavy-duty drill for home improvement projects
campingDescription: Complete camping gear for outdoor adventures
insuranceDescription: Optional comprehensive insurance coverage for your rental items
premiumDescription: Boost your listing visibility and get more rental requests
pricingCTA: Join our community of successful item owners and start earning extra income with your unused tools and equipment.
featuresSubtitle: Everything you need for seamless tool sharing
securePaymentsDesc: Bank-level encryption and secure payment processing with escrow protection for all transactions.
verifiedUsersDesc: All users go through identity verification to ensure trust and safety in every transaction.
realTimeChatDesc: Instant messaging system for seamless communication between renters and item owners.
flexibleSchedulingDesc: Easy booking system with customizable rental periods and availability management.
reviewSystemDesc: Comprehensive rating and review system to help users make informed decisions.
mobileAppDesc: Fully responsive design that works perfectly on all devices and screen sizes.
smartMatchingDesc: Our AI-powered system matches you with the perfect tools and reliable owners based on your needs and location.
aiPoweredDesc: Advanced algorithms that continuously improve your rental experience.
dataProtectionDesc: Your personal information is protected with industry-standard encryption and privacy measures.
fraudProtectionDesc: Advanced fraud detection systems and secure payment processing to protect all users.
customerSupportDesc: 24/7 customer support team ready to help with any questions or issues.
firebaseBackendDesc: Scalable cloud infrastructure and real-time database
firebaseAIDesc: AI-powered chatbot for instant customer support
featuresCTA: Join thousands of users who trust Rento for their tool sharing needs.
termsSubtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our service.
termsIntroText1: Welcome to Rento. These Terms of Service govern your use of our platform and services.
termsIntroText2: By accessing or using Rento, you agree to be bound by these terms and all applicable laws and regulations.
termsIntroText3: If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this service.
serviceDefinitionText: Rento refers to the online platform that facilitates the rental of tools and equipment between users.
userDefinitionText: Any individual or entity that accesses or uses the Rento platform, including renters and item owners.
contentDefinitionText: All information, data, text, images, and other materials uploaded, posted, or shared on the platform.
rentalDefinitionText: The temporary use of tools or equipment in exchange for payment, facilitated through our platform.
acceptanceText1: By creating an account or using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
acceptanceText2: These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Rento regarding your use of the platform.
acceptanceText3: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, with notice provided to users.
accountCreationText1: To use certain features of Rento, you must create an account with accurate and complete information.
accountCreationText2: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
accountCreationText3: You must be at least 18 years old to create an account and use our services.
accountSecurityText1: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
accountSecurityText2: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
accountSecurityText3: We are not liable for any loss or damage arising from unauthorized account access.
accountTerminationText1: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these terms.
accountTerminationText2: You may terminate your account at any time by contacting our support team.
accountTerminationText3: Upon termination, your right to use the service will cease immediately.
permittedUse1: Use the platform for legitimate rental transactions
permittedUse3: Respect the rights of other users
permittedUse4: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
prohibitedUse1: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
prohibitedUse3: Harass, abuse, or harm other users
prohibitedUse5: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
listingItemsText1: Item owners must provide accurate descriptions and images of their items.
listingItemsText2: All items must be in good working condition and safe for use.
listingItemsText3: We reserve the right to remove listings that violate our policies.
rentalProcessText1: Rentals are facilitated through our secure booking system.
rentalProcessText2: Payment is processed through our secure payment gateway.
rentalProcessText3: Both parties must agree to the rental terms before proceeding.
paymentTermsText1: All payments are processed securely through our payment partners.
paymentTermsText2: Platform fees are deducted from the total rental amount.
paymentTermsText3: Refunds are processed according to our refund policy.
privacyText1: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information.
privacyText2: Your data is collected, used, and protected in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
privacyText3: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information.
platformIPText: All content, features, and functionality of Rento are owned by us and protected by intellectual property laws.
userContentText: You retain ownership of content you upload, but grant us a license to use it for platform operations.
licenseText: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive license to use our platform in accordance with these terms.
serviceDisclaimerText: We strive to maintain service availability but cannot guarantee uninterrupted access.
liabilityDisclaimerText: We are not liable for damages arising from the use of rented items or user interactions.
warrantyDisclaimerText: We provide the platform 'as is' without warranties of any kind.
liabilityText1: In no event shall Rento be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages.
liabilityText2: Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid by you for our services in the past 12 months.
liabilityText3: Some jurisdictions do not allow liability limitations, so these may not apply to you.
indemnificationText1: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Rento from any claims arising from your use of the platform.
indemnificationText2: This includes claims related to your content, rental activities, or violation of these terms.
indemnificationText3: We reserve the right to assume the defense of any such claims.
governingLawText1: These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where Rento operates.
governingLawText2: Any disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration or in the appropriate courts.
governingLawText3: The United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods does not apply.
changesText1: We may update these terms from time to time to reflect changes in our services or legal requirements.
changesText2: We will notify users of significant changes through email or platform notifications.
changesText3: Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
contactText1: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us.
faq1Question: How much commission does Rento take?
faq1Answer: We take a 10% commission from each successful rental to cover platform costs and services.
faq2Answer: No, our pricing is completely transparent. The commission is clearly displayed before booking.
faq3Question: When do I receive my earnings?
faq3Answer: Earnings are typically released within 24-48 hours after the rental period ends.
helpSubtitle: Find answers to your questions and get the support you need
searchHelpDesc: Browse our extensive catalog of tools and equipment
liveChatDesc: Get instant help from our AI-powered chatbot
emailSupportDesc: Send us a detailed message and we'll respond within 24 hours
faq1Question: How do I create an account?
faq1Answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button and provide your email, password, and basic information to create your account.
faq2Question: How do I list my first item?
faq2Answer: Go to your profile, click 'Add Tool', fill in the details, upload photos, and set your price.
faq3Question: How do I verify my account?
faq3Answer: We'll send you a verification email. Click the link in the email to verify your account.
faq4Question: How do I rent an item?
faq4Answer: Browse items, select your dates, review the terms, and complete your booking with secure payment.
faq5Question: What if the item is damaged?
faq5Answer: Contact us immediately. We have insurance coverage and will help resolve any issues.
faq6Answer: Yes, you can cancel up to 24 hours before the rental start time for a full refund.
faq7Question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq7Answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets through our secure payment system.
faq8Answer: Payment is processed when you complete your booking. The owner receives payment after the rental period.
faq9Answer: Yes, we use bank-level encryption and secure payment processing to protect your information.
privacySubtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we protect your data.
whoWeAreDescription: We are a passionate team dedicated to revolutionizing the way people access tools and equipment. Our platform connects communities, promotes sustainability, and makes quality tools accessible to everyone. Through innovative technology and a commitment to user experience, we're building a future where sharing resources is the norm.
fromDrillsToDrones: From drills to drones, cameras to camping gear — we've got it all
varietyOfToolsDescription: Access to thousands of tools and equipment across multiple categories, ensuring you find exactly what you need for any project.
secureTransactionsDescription: Bank-level security with escrow protection ensures your payments and personal information are always safe and secure.
flexibleOptionsDescription: Choose from various rental periods, delivery options, and payment methods that work best for your schedule and budget.
ecoConsciousDescription: Reduce waste and environmental impact by sharing resources instead of buying items you'll only use occasionally.
createAccountFree: Create your account for free and start renting or listing your tools today.
